about.title: About Zam Zam Trading
about.description: Zam Zam Trading is a trusted supplier and government contractor in Bangladesh with over 15 years of experience. We supply finishing thread for garments, stone and sand for construction, and raw materials for feed mills. With extensive industry experience and a reliable nationwide network, we ensure on-time delivery and consistent quality for all our clients.

about.title: Procurement Support
about.description: Our teams support tender documentation, procurement planning, supplier coordination, and last-mile logistics, helping organizations meet project timelines and compliance requirements with confidence.

about.title: Trusted by clients
about.description: Trusted by 500+ public and private sector clients

about.title: Mission
about.description: Deliver dependable supply solutions with integrity, speed, and complete documentation for every contract.

about.title: Capability
about.description: Multi-category sourcing for garments, construction, and feed mills, supported by structured vendor partnerships.

about.title: Commitment
about.description: Consistent quality, on-time delivery, and proactive communication across every project and client.

partnerChoice.title: End-to-End Government Contracting Support
partnerChoice.description: From tender document preparation to final delivery and billing, we manage the full lifecycle of government supply contracts with clear communication and documented processes.

partnerChoice.title: Specialized Supply Expertise
partnerChoice.description: Deep operational understanding of finishing thread, construction aggregates, and feed mill raw materials helps us recommend the right specification for each project requirement.

partnerChoice.title: Compliance & Quality Assurance
partnerChoice.description: Materials are sourced from vetted partners, aligned with government standards, and supported with test reports and delivery documentation where required.

partnerChoice.title: Reliable Nationwide Logistics
partnerChoice.description: Coordinated transport and on-site delivery across Bangladesh ensure that projects receive materials on time, reducing downtime and cost overruns.

services.title: Government Contracting
services.description:
End-to-end tender participation, procurement, and fulfillment for government projects across Bangladesh.
• Pre-qualification and tender documentation
• Schedule-based supply planning
• Compliance-ready delivery records

services.title: Garments Finishing Thread Supply
services.description:
Reliable supply of finishing threads tailored to diverse garments manufacturing needs nationwide.
• Color, strength, and finish matching
• Bulk supply with batch consistency
• Factory-ready delivery schedules

services.title: Stone & Sand Supply
services.description:
High-quality aggregates sourced and delivered for construction projects of any scale across Bangladesh.
• Grading and size specification support
• Site-to-site logistics coordination
• Volume-based pricing options

services.title: Feed Mill Raw Materials Supply
services.description:
Consistent sourcing of grains and additives ensuring optimal feed production for agricultural industry.
• Reliable raw material sourcing
• Quality checks on intake
• Seasonal supply continuity

faq.title: What types of government contracts do you handle?
faq.description: We handle various government contracts including construction material supply, finishing thread supply for garments, and raw materials for feed mills. Our experience spans over 15 years in government procurement.

faq.title: Do you provide nationwide delivery?
faq.description: Yes, we provide nationwide delivery across Bangladesh. Our logistics network ensures timely delivery to all major cities and remote areas throughout the country.

faq.title: What quality assurance measures do you follow?
faq.description: We follow strict quality control measures including pre-delivery inspections, certified sourcing from approved suppliers, and compliance with government quality standards.

faq.title: How can I request a quote for bulk orders?
faq.description: You can request a quote by contacting us directly through phone or email. Please provide details about the materials needed, quantity, and delivery location for an accurate quote.

faq.title: What are your payment terms?
faq.description: We offer flexible payment terms depending on the contract size and client relationship. Standard terms include advance payment, delivery-based payments, and credit facilities for established clients.

faq.title: Can you support urgent or phased deliveries?
faq.description: Yes. We plan phased deliveries based on project schedules, with priority logistics support for urgent requirements and critical project milestones.

faq.title: Do you provide documentation for compliance and audits?
faq.description: We provide delivery notes, material specifications, and supporting documents required for internal reviews and procurement audits.
